abstract: In a survey, nearly half of iPhone and G1 owners report shopping for apps more than once a week.
snippet: In a survey, nearly half of iPhone and G1 owners report shopping for apps more than once a week.
lead_paragraph: As Apple prepares for its Worldwide Developers Conference next week, where it will lay out how it plans to maintain its lead in the simmering battle of smartphone platforms, there is some interesting new data about the use of applications on mobile devices.
